enb_long_title: Vienna Climate Change Talks 2007 - AWG 4 and the Dialogue 4
section_title: THE MIDNIGHT SUN DIALOGUE ON CLIMATE CHANGE:
sentences: From 11 to 14 June 2007, delegates from 28 countries and the European Commission gathered in Riksgr nsen, Sweden, for an informal dialogue on climate change.
The meeting was organized following two similar gatherings in Greenland in 2005 and South Africa in 2006.

While no consensus was attempted and no formal conclusions were adopted, participants sought to enhance prospects for agreements in future negotiations by exchanging views on the principles and elements of a future international climate regime.
